title: this is really not ok
body:
i dont play syndra often... becuase i rarely play mid nowadays

but

this

https://youtu.be/_b-zCATNchA?t=494

SHOULD have 1 shot the corki

look at syndra's items... 
{{item:3020}} {{item:3151}} {{item:1082}} {{item:3165}} at 10 stacks (and if u care about it {{item:1056}} 

he is at 80% hp after she lands a sphere
corki only has {{item:3111}}  for mr

then syndra lands a SIX sphere ultimate

THAT SHOULD ONE SHOT HIM!!!

syndra cant just "press R"

a six sphere ultimate requires 3 sphere son the ground.. each has a 4 second cdr  and the last 6 seconds ( 8 seconds if Q is maxed) so takes a MINIMUM of 7 seconds to set 45% max cdr, with the only 20% she had, it would take about 10 seconds to set up all 3 on the ground plus the 3 around you.

its not just "pressing R" it needs to be TIMED correct and you can ONLY do it AT certain times.
